Text:
Your uploads are so varied and so interesting, this one included. Thanks for all the effort you put into getting these books online.

O, and why do you say that "lapsed Catholic" is an "absurd phrase"? The comment intrigued me! :-)

Glad you like the books!

"Lapsed" sounds patronizing, as if the decision to leave the Church were similar to forgetting to renew a driver's license rather than a matter of conscience and discernment.
